text: Straight Shooting is a 1917 American western movie. It was directed by John Ford. Actors include Harry Carey, Hoot Gibson, George Berrell, and Molly Malone. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1917 movies Category:1910s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by John Ford Category:Universal Pictures movies
title: Straight Shooting
